required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Fasting on Success Rates of Assisted Reproductive Techologies
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Fasting on Success Rates of In-vitro-fertilization (IVF) / Intracytoplasmatic Sperm Injection (ICSI) in Women With Fertility Disorders

brief_summary.textblock: This exploratory study investigates fasting as a potential supportive therapy for infertility treatment in women undergoing in-vitro-fertilization (IVF) / intracystoplamsatic sperm injection (ICSI)

detailed_description.textblock: This 2-arm, randomized, controlled exploratory clinical trial aims to explore fasting as a novel supportive treatment in female infertility during IVF / ICSI. The participants will be randomized in two groups: a fasting group and a waiting list. The intervention group follows a fasting intervention, whereas the patients on the waiting list continue their normal diet. All groups will be trained and accompanied by medical experts. In addition, qualitative interviews will be conducted including individual and focus group interviews with a subgroup of participants.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: This explorative study is conducted in form of a randomized, controlled trial design with a fasting intervention and a waiting list, which continues the usual diet.
study_design_info.masking_description: It is not possible to mask a fasting intervention for the participant or the study personel. Therefore only outcome assessors are masked.

primary_outcome.time_frame: throughout 1-3 days after in-vitro-fertilization (IVF) / intracytoplasmatic sperm injection (ICSI)
primary_outcome.description: Fertilisation rate of the retrieved oocytes

secondary_outcome.measure: glucose in culture medium of oocytes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: throughout 1-3 days after in vitro fertilisation
secondary_outcome.description: chemical composition of culture medium (glucose)

secondary_outcome.measure: lactate in culture medium of oocytes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: throughout 1-3 days after in vitro fertilisation
secondary_outcome.description: chemical composition of culture medium (lactate)

secondary_outcome.measure: pyruvate in culture medium of oocytes
secondary_outcome.time_frame: throughout 1-3 days after in vitro fertilisation
secondary_outcome.description: chemical composition of culture medium (pyruvate)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks after IVF/ICSI
secondary_outcome.description: pregnancies after IVF/ICSI

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at IVF / ICSI intervention
secondary_outcome.description: rate of mature oocytes

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 10 months after IVF/ICSI
secondary_outcome.description: rate of life births after IVF/ICSI

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at IVF/ICSI
secondary_outcome.description: rate of implantable embryos after the IVF/ICSI

secondary_outcome.measure: Course of IVF/ICSI preparation and pregnancy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks and 10 months after IVF / ICSI
secondary_outcome.description: Course of IVF/ICSI preparation and pregnancy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, within one week before IVF, 4 weeks after IVF, 10 months after baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Quality of life

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, within one week before IVF, 4 weeks after IVF, 10 months after baseline
secondary_outcome.description: self-developed questionnaire to examine dietary behaviour

secondary_outcome.description: MAAS-questionnaire, validated questionnaire to examine mindfulness

secondary_outcome.time_frame: baseline, within one week before IVF, 4 weeks after IVF, 10 months after baseline
secondary_outcome.description: HADS-questionnaire, validated questionnaire to examine anxiety and depression

secondary_outcome.description: validated questionnaire to examine gratitude

secondary_outcome.description: ASKU, validated questionnaire to examine self-efficacy

secondary_outcome.time_frame: within 1 month before, during and within 2 weeks after the fasting intervention
secondary_outcome.description: sonography in a subgroup

arm_group.description: Participants will be councelled and accompanied to follow a fasting regime of 7 days in an outpatient setting under medical supervision.

This group maintains their individual diet during the whole time of the study. In case that the first cycle of In-Vitro-Fertilization fails, they are offered a fasting intervention before a next cycle.

intervention.description: fasting for 7 days (caloric intake <500 kcal in liquid form)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Women aged 25 to 38 years with planned IVF / ICSI
- 1 ng/ml ≤ Anti-Mullerian Hormone (AMH) ≤ 4 ng/ml
- Unfulfilled desire to have children >1 year
- 25 kg/m² ≤ BMI ≤ 35 kg/m² declaration of consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Language barriers
- Previously known serious mental illness or cognitive impairment
- Patients with anatomical/organic damage and proven uterine abnormalities
- Eating disorders in the medical history
- Serious previous internal diseases
- Lack of internet access
- No consent to randomisation
- Participation in other studies

facility.name: Hochschulambulanz für Naturheilkunde der Charité-Universitätsmedizin Berlin

patient_data.ipd_description: Data will be made available upon request.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: after the end of the study for 5 years
